video.title: Velvet
video.synopsis: In 1950s Spain, the heir to a fashion house romances a beautiful seamstress who works for the company, despite the objections of his family.

episodes.synopsis: When Don Rafael presents the latest collection of his fashion house, his son Alberto returns home from his studies abroad.
episodes.title: Alas de Mariposa

episodes.synopsis: Ana and Alberto learn that Don Rafael has died. Now the managing director of Velvet, Alberto has to share his inheritance with Gloria and Patricia.
episodes.title: La Costurera

episodes.synopsis: Velvet is on the verge of bankruptcy. Gerardo, a family friend, offers to save Velvet if Alberto agrees to marry his daughter Cristina.
episodes.title: Alejate de Mi

episodes.synopsis: Alberto hopes that the new collection will be a major success so he can pay off Gerardo and break his engagement to Cristina.
episodes.title: Nada es tan Sencillo

episodes.synopsis: Alberto pursues his affair with Ana, Pedro's girlfriend falls for Alberto's assistant, and Luisa pays a high price for Don Francisco's support.
episodes.title: El Disenador

episodes.synopsis: Ana and Cristina search for the perfect gift for Alberto's birthday. Rita is finding it hard to cover for her sister Clara, who's cheating on Pedro.
episodes.title: Entre dos Mujeres

episodes.synopsis: When Alberto and Ana join Raul on a trip to Paris, Cristina shows up unexpectedly. To escape Don Francisco's harassment, Luisa turns to his wife.
episodes.title: Paris

episodes.synopsis: Back from Paris, Ana feels certain that Cristina is Alberto's true love. Meanwhile, Blanca discovers Max's true identity.
episodes.title: El Dia Despues

episodes.synopsis: As the wedding approaches, Alberto sees Ana with another man and has to choose between her and Cristina. Luisa's husband, Juan, gets sick again.
episodes.title: La Decision de Alberto

episodes.synopsis: Ana refuses to marry Alberto in a secret ceremony. Raul de la Riva returns, but a last-minute setback could endanger the fashion show.
episodes.title: El Gran Dia

episodes.synopsis: Ana is ready to fight for Alberto at all costs. After her success at the fashion show, Clara gets an interesting offer.
episodes.title: Los Restos del Naufragio

episodes.synopsis: Emilio, the head of the sales staff, is seriously ill. Clara wants to start a career as a model, but things don't go as planned.
episodes.title: La Visita

episodes.synopsis: Grace of Monaco visits Velvet. Cristina surprises Alberto with a party at the country club and learns things about Ana she never expected.
episodes.title: Terciopelo Azul

episodes.synopsis: When Cristina sees Alberto and Ana together, her worst fears seem to be confirmed. Clara expects Mateo to take her to the wedding of the year.
episodes.title: Mentiras Piadosas

episodes.synopsis: The day before the wedding, Cristina's dress disappears, and Ana has to do her best to save the ceremony. Tensions between Max and Blanca continue.
episodes.title: La Noche de la Reina

episodes.synopsis: The big day has come, and Cristina has to approve the new dress Ana made overnight. Alberto receives a mysterious letter.
episodes.title: Cuenta Atras

episodes.synopsis: Upon returning from his honeymoon, Alberto learns that his brother-in-law has taken charge of both the family business and the gallery.
episodes.title: La noche de los alfileres

episodes.synopsis: When Airsa airlines orders uniforms for their crew, Alberto makes a revolutionary proposal; Pedro's big lie threatens to push Rita into Adolfo's arms.
episodes.title: Remontando el vuelo

episodes.synopsis: Ana gets a promotion at the airline; Enrique hires a new designer behind Alberto's back; Patricia teaches Gloria a lesson she won't forget.
episodes.title: Días de Gloria

episodes.synopsis: Alberto struggles to accept Ana's relationship with Carlos; Raúl de la Riva returns and must open Cristina's eyes to the truth to clear his good name.
episodes.title: Coser y Cantar

episodes.synopsis: Alberto decides to take Ana along to New York to help him close the deal; when the gallery suffers a big financial setback, Alberto holds an auction.
episodes.title: Quién da más

episodes.synopsis: Alberto and Ana arrive in New York, counting on their presentation's success, but when things get complicated, the gallery's future hangs by a thread.
episodes.title: New York, New York

episodes.synopsis: Alberto prepares to make an announcement; now that Rita is single, Pedro yearns to deny his affair with Rosa Maria and to confess his love for Rita.
episodes.title: Por los aires

episodes.synopsis: On Christmas Eve, holiday cheer illuminates the gallery, but as staffers head to their villages and families, some, like Ana and Emilio, remain alone.
episodes.title: Navidades Blancas

episodes.synopsis: As always, the Twelfth Day is the busiest day of the year; Alberto's conflict with Enrique seems to be resolved, but he and Ana still have issues.
episodes.title: Noche de Reyes

episodes.synopsis: The new uniforms are unveiled; Cristina learns that Alberto is cheating as he gets shocking news of his own; Blanca confronts ghosts from the past.
episodes.title: La hora de la verdad

episodes.synopsis: Ana has unfinished business with Carlos; madly in love, Pedro and Rita ponder a step forward; Luisa returns to the radio with a case of stage fright.
episodes.title: Hoy es el día de los enamorados

episodes.synopsis: Alberto savors time with his mother and Isabel, secretly knowing they must soon part; Ana and Carlos suffer over their breakup.
episodes.title: Despedidas

episodes.synopsis: Isabel's departure leaves a hole in Alberto's life, forcing him to grow; as Rita and Pedro's wedding draws near, the lovebirds face new challenges.
episodes.title: Una boda y un funeral
